title: mangaLam bhavatu
sahitya:
mangaLam bhavatu tE mAtanga vadana jaya





anupallavi



 mangaLam shikhivAha vANI gurunAtha shubha mangaLam

 nandIsha mahita guNa caNDEsha mangaLam



caraNam

 mangaLam shrIkaNTha madhurEsha harikEsha mangaLam jagadIsha

 mangaLam sOmEsha mangaLam sarvEsha mahAbalagiri vAsa
